name: Bartolo
description:
- Leather
- Dual rolled top handles 
- Single detachable, adjustable strap 
- Zip around top closure 
- Exterior features topstitching, 2 side zip compartments, and 1 front zip pocket 
- Interior features 1 zip pocket 
- Approx. 12" H x 19.25" W x 10.25" D 
- Approx. 8" handle drop, 11-22" strap drop 
- Made in Italy
-MAY TAKE UP TO 3 WEEKS TO SHIP
